segments.source_content:
---
id: speeding-ci-builds
title: Speeding Up CI Builds
---
You or your company may have set up a Continuous Integration (CI) environment to test your React Native application.

translations.zh-hant: 您或您的公司可能已設置了持續整合（CI）環境來測試 React Native 應用程式。

segments.source_content: A fast CI service is important for 2 reasons:

translations.zh-hant: 快速的 CI 服務之所以重要，有以下兩個原因：

segments.source_content:
- The more time CI machines are running, the more they cost.
- The longer the CI jobs take to run, the longer the development loop.

translations.zh-hant:
- CI 機器運行的時間越長，成本就越高。
- CI 作業執行時間越長，開發循環就越長。

segments.source_content: It is therefore important to try and minimize the time the CI environment spends building React Native.

translations.zh-hant: 因此，盡量減少 CI 環境構建 React Native 的時間非常重要。

segments.source_content: [Flipper](https://github.com/facebook/flipper) is a debugging tool shipped by default with React Native, to help developers debug and profile their React Native applications. However, Flipper is not required in CI: it is very unlikely that you or one of your collegue would have to debug the app built in the CI environment.

translations.zh-hant: [Flipper](https://github.com/facebook/flipper) 是 React Native 預設提供的除錯工具，用於幫助開發者除錯和分析他們的 React Native 應用程式。然而，在 CI 環境中並不需要 Flipper：您或您的同事不太可能需要除錯在 CI 環境中構建的應用程式。

segments.source_content: For iOS apps, Flipper is built every time the React Native framework is built and it may require some time to build, and this is time you can save.

translations.zh-hant: 對於 iOS 應用程式，每次構建 React Native 框架時都會構建 Flipper，這可能需要一些時間，而這些時間是可以節省的。

segments.source_content: Starting from React Native 0.71, we introduced a new flag in the template's Podfile: the [`NO_FLIPPER` flag](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/react-native/template/ios/Podfile#L20).

translations.zh-hant: 從 React Native 0.71 開始，我們在模板的 Podfile 中引入了一個新標誌：[`NO_FLIPPER` 標誌](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/react-native/template/ios/Podfile#L20)。

segments.source_content: By default, the `NO_FLIPPER` flag is not set, therefore Flipper will be included by default in your app.

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下，`NO_FLIPPER` 標誌未設置，因此 Flipper 會預設包含在您的應用程式中。

segments.source_content: You can specify `NO_FLIPPER=1` when installing your iOS pods, to instruct React Native not to install Flipper. Typically, the command would look like this:

translations.zh-hant: 您可以在安裝 iOS pods 時指定 `NO_FLIPPER=1`，以指示 React Native 不安裝 Flipper。通常，命令會如下所示：

segments.source_content:
```shell
# from the root folder of the react native project
NO_FLIPPER=1 bundle exec pod install --project-directory=ios
```
Add this command in your CI environment to skip the installation of Flipper dependencies and thus saving time and money.

translations.zh-hant: 在您的 CI 環境中添加此命令，以跳過 Flipper 依賴項的安裝，從而節省時間和金錢。

segments.source_content: Your app may be using some libraries which depends on the Flipper pods. If that's your case, disabling flipper with the `NO_FLIPPER` flag may not be enough: your app may fail to build in this case.

translations.zh-hant: 您的應用程式可能使用了一些依賴於 Flipper pods 的函式庫。如果是這種情況，僅使用 `NO_FLIPPER` 標誌停用 Flipper 可能不夠：您的應用程式可能會因此無法構建。

segments.source_content: The proper way to handle this case is to add a custom configuration for react native, instructing the app to properly install the transitive dependency. To achieve that:

translations.zh-hant: 處理這種情況的正確方法是為 React Native 添加自定義配置，指示應用程式正確安裝傳遞依賴項。為此：

segments.source_content:
1. If you don't have it already, create a new file called `react-native.config.js`.
2. Exclude explicitly the transitive dependency from the `dependency` when the flag is turned on.

translations.zh-hant:
1. 如果尚未擁有，請創建一個名為 `react-native.config.js` 的新文件。
2. 當標誌開啟時，明確從 `dependency` 中排除傳遞依賴項。
